channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 9th July
item.description:
Been there for a number of weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ivy Road, Brockley, London

item.title: Uneven & Cracked Paving Slabs, 8th July
item.description:
Albion Road at the junction with the Albion Road Multi-Storey Public Car Park (old Civic Offices Car Park), Bexleyheath: I reported this last year however no action was taken. Please could you replace the uneven and cracked paving slabs - picture attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albion Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Items, 8th July
item.description:
Cinema Public Car Park, 22 Broadway, Bexleyheath, DA6 7RB: Please could you remove a dumped pram, a box of litter and dumped rubbish bags next to the blue recycling bins outside the Cinema Public Car Park - picture attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clearly a need for a dog mess bin here given so close to a park, 8th July
item.description:
Can the dog mess bags be removed from this green box and could a dog mess bin be sited here attached to a lamp post or free standing?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Avenue, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking pavement, 8th July
item.description:
Please have this removed ASAP before somebody Trips over it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19-24, Dunnock Close, London

item.title: Terrible smelling drain, 8th July
item.description:
We have for several years in the summer suffered from a terrible smelling drain. It’s the one closest to the junction with Acer Road and Holly Street. It’s absolutely disgusting and comes into both our bedroom and living area every night.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Acer Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to lamppost which is now leaning and damage to path, 8th July
item.description:
Someone has driven into a lamppost/ pole outside 81 Lawrie Park Road. Pole is now leaning over toward ground and damage to pavement where pole has been ripped up. happened between 2pm and 6pm on 8 jul.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Lawrie Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Albert Westcott House needs cleaning, 8th July
item.description:
The ground floor of the building stinks after someone poured dirty water across it at the weekend. The floor is now stained and needs to be cleaned, as does the lift (which also smells) and all the windows opposite the lift doors on each floor of the building.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 285, Walworth Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree base growing into pavement, 8th July
item.description:
This tree is in the play park. It grows from the lower trunk across the pavement. This also restricts motorists view when emerging from Northall Road. It is an annual occurrence.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Way, Barnehurst, London
